```{r echo=F, warning=F, message=F, fig.width=8, fig.height=6}
library(dlstats)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
pkg <- c("ChIPseeker",
         "clusterProfiler",
         "DOSE",
         "ggtree",
         "GOSemSim",
         "meshes",
         "ReactomePA",
         "treeio")
d <- bioc_stats(pkg)
last_month_idx <- group_by(d, package) %>% summarize(which.max(end))
d <- d[-last_month_idx[[2]],]
p <- ggplot(d, aes(end, Nb_of_distinct_IPs, group=package, color=package)) +
    geom_line() + geom_point() + theme_minimal() + xlab(NULL) + ylab(NULL) +
    labs(title="Monthly download stats (distinct IPs)",
         caption="data from Bioconductor") +
    theme(legend.title=element_blank(), legend.position=c(.08, .7))
ggplotly(p)
```
